EmailTemplate.description: Gentle reminder on Tech Pubs access requirements
EmailTemplate.name: Pubs Denial
EmailTemplate.subject: BendixKing Publication Request {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting BendixKing Technical Publications.
Our records indicate that you are not authorized to receive this publication.
BendixKing technical manuals are distributed exclusively through our dealer network. A BendixKing dealer can address any questions regarding installations, product repairs, or exchanges.
You can search our global network of BendixKing Repair Partners by going to https://bendixking.com/en/pages/find-a-dealer.
Thank you,
BendixKing Technical Publications Team
pubs@bendixking.com
www.bendixking.com
{!EmailMessage.TextBody}
